DOC.detailed_description: Experimental Design Methods : This prospective randomized control trial intubation use C-MAC video laryngoscope versus standard laryngoscopy patient require emergent intubation Emergency Department . Study Setting Population : This study perform urban county medical center approximately 97,000 patient visit per year . Adult patient ( age > 17 ) require intubation enrol . Study Protocol : All ED patient unable adequately breathe require emergent intubation airway management screen inclusion study . Identified patient deem eligible need intubation determine treat physician . Eligible patient place capnograph , cardiac , blood pressure pulse oximetry monitor . Patients randomly assign intubate use standard laryngoscopy C-MAC blade C-MAC videolaryngoscope . Sealed envelope contain randomization assignment treatment group keep patient 's bedside stabilization room . Patients monitor oxygen saturation , blood pressure , heart rate , respiratory rate , typical patient require intubation ED . Data record every minute train research assistant patient 's bedside . The low oxygen saturation procedure record determination hypoxia . Hypoxia define oxygen saturation < 93 % . The number attempt make intubate total time successful intubation record . An attempt start intubate device enters patient mouth end endotracheal tube placement confirm new intubating device put patient mouth previous device remove . Data collection include time number breath give via Bag-Valve-Mask patient reposition attempt . All treatment record . Data collection continue patient discharge Emergency Department . The patient 's diagnosis time discharge ED record . Patients ' chart review determine diagnosis , occurrence aspiration pneumonia , ICU length stay , inpatient length stay . Two attempt make contact patient 28 day study enrollment determine condition time . Data Analysis : Data collect designate research assistant procedure enter EXCEL ( Microsoft Corp. , Redmond , WA ) database storage . Data export STATA 10.0 ( STATA Corp. , College Station , TX ) analysis . The number attempt successful intubation total time intubation compare use descriptive statistic . Occurrence hypoxia aspiration pneumonia compare patient intubated C-MAC patient intubated standard laryngoscopy use Chi-Square test . Oxygen saturation , ETCO2 , heart rate compare group use multiple linear regression . The length stay 28 day follow two group compare use Wilcoxon rank sum test . In order detect 15 % difference length stay two group , power 80 % alpha 0.05 , 100 patient require group total 200 patient .
